Package simple.escp.fill.function

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsciiFunction
    A built-in function that will return character based on ASCII number.
    AutoIncrementFunction
    A built-in function that will define a new global number variable.
    BoldFunction
    A built-in function that will generate ESC/P to toggle bold font style.
    DoubleStrikeFunction
    A built-in function that will generate ESC/P to toggle double-strike font style.
    Function
    This class represents a function that can be called in JSON template by using expression in %{...} format.
    GlobalLineNoFunction
    A built-in function that will return the global line number.
    ItalicFunction
    A built-in function that will generate ESC/P to toggle italic font style.
    LineNoFunction
    A built-in function that will return the current line number.
    PageNoFunction
    A built-in function that will return current page number.
    SubscriptFunction
    A built-in function that will generate ESC/P to toggle subscript printing.
    SuperscriptFunction
    A built-in function that will generate ESC/P to toggle superscript printing.
    UnderlineFunction
    A built-in function that will generate ESC/P to toggle underline.
